entry.title: How Apple Keeps AirDrop Files Private and Secure | iMore
entry.content:
Rene Ritchie di iMore:

Encrypted identities

When AirDrop is turned on, a 2048-bit RSA Identity is created and stored on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac. A hash, based on the phone numbers and/or email addresses associated with your Apple ID, is also created. That’ll be used later to identify you in a way that maintains your privacy and security.

Security! Security!

entry.title: #MacStoriesDeals Black Friday 2014: Best Deals for iPhone, iPad, and Mac Apps & Games
entry.content:
Macstories

Black Friday is upon us once again! #MacStoriesDeals is the best place to find great deals for iOS apps and games, Mac software, and more.

Macstories telah merangkum beberapa deals diskon aplikasi baik untuk iPhone, iPad hingga Mac menjelang Black Friday.

Fantastical 2 yang menjadi aplikasi kalender favorit saya juga ada dalam daftar, kini hanya $1.99 untuk iPhone dan $4.99 untuk iPad serta $9.99 untuk Mac. Jika belum yakin untuk mencoba Fantastical 2 maka sebaiknya baca dulu review dari Macstories.

Selain deals di atas, Text Expander Touch menjadi Rp. 12 Ribu di App Store Indonesia. Namun ketika saya membuka App Store US, harga dari Text Expander Touch masih sama yaitu $4.99.

So, stay update!

entry.title: iPhone - Blackberry Trade Up Offer
entry.content:
Blackberry di situsnya:

Trade your iPhone for a BlackBerry Passport and get up to $550!

For a limited time, starting December 1st.

Upgrade to a BlackBerryÂ® Passport and get up to $400 back for your iPhone and an additional $150 from BlackBerry.

Ada yang mau tukar iPhone 6-nya sama Blackberry Passport?
